# Description of data

Raw data that from the NEUTC project entitled "Incorporating Large Language Models (LLMs) into Transportation Safety Analytics and Equity".Using LLMs to improve safety and equity through crash data, disparities in traffic safety, for road users and underserved communities.

## Who Created

Uploaded by Fitzpatrick, Cole

## When data was published

February 23, 2025

## Title

Incorporating Large Language Models (LLMs) into Transportation Safety Analytics and Equity
